leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-分子动力学与力场生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 力场→模拟→分析→可视化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: MD引擎 + 势模型 + 分析

queries: [WEB] adaptive sampling machine learning potentials github
[WEB] automated training set generation molecular dynamics github

tools.name: ProSim
tools.one_line_profile: Promptable closed-loop traffic simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A closed-loop traffic simulation framework that allows for promptable agent behaviors, designed for evaluating autonomous driving policies and traffic modeling in transportation research.

tools.name: MultiAxis3DPrinting_ToolpathGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Toolpath generator for multi-axis 3D printing
tools.detailed_description: A C++ based toolpath generation algorithm for hybrid printing on curved working surfaces, supporting multi-axis additive manufacturing processes in engineering research.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning interatomic potential predictions library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for developing machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIP) for materials simulations. It supports various descriptors and regression models to predict energy, forces, and stress tensors of crystals.

tools.name: AutoForce
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Gaussian Process Potentials for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating machine learning interatomic potentials using Sparse Gaussian Processes. It facilitates the creation of force fields for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: arcann_training
tools.one_line_profile: Automated enhanced sampling generation of training sets for ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for the automated generation of training sets for chemically reactive machine learning interatomic potentials using enhanced sampling techniques.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for MLIP generation
tools.detailed_description: An active learning workflow developed for generating Machine Learning Inter-Atomic Potentials (MLIPs), demonstrated on systems like Hafnium dioxide.

tools.name: jax_fdm
tools.one_line_profile: Auto-differentiable and hardware-accelerated force density method
tools.detailed_description: A library for structural form-finding using the Force Density Method (FDM), implemented in JAX to enable automatic differentiation and hardware acceleration.

tools.name: mdgen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative modeling of molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating molecular dynamics trajectories using generative models, enabling simulation and sampling of molecular systems.

tools.name: Cairn.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced sampling algorithms for active learning of ML-IPs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing enhanced sampling algorithms specifically designed for the active learning of machine learning interatomic potentials (ML-IPs).

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed to generate many-body potential energy representations for molecular dynamics simulations. It combines the accuracy of ab initio methods with the efficiency of classical force fields, enabling large-scale simulations of complex systems.

tools.name: ALF
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning Framework for training machine-learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate active learning for training machine-learned interatomic potentials (MLIPs). It automates the sampling of configurations and training loops to improve potential accuracy efficiently.

tools.name: NeuralForceField
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based implementation of neural network force fields
tools.detailed_description: A library for training and evaluating neural network-based force fields for molecular simulations, implemented in PyTorch. It provides tools for modeling potential energy surfaces.

tools.name: DEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Data efficient active learning framework for machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: DEAL (Data Efficient Active Learning) is a Python framework designed to optimize the training of machine learning interatomic potentials. It implements active learning strategies to select the most informative atomic configurations, minimizing the need for expensive quantum mechanical calculations during force field development.

tools.name: FLARE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Learning of Atomistic Rare Events for creating interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: FLARE is an open-source Python package designed for creating fast and accurate interatomic potentials using machine learning (specifically Gaussian Process Regression). It supports active learning to automatically collect training data during molecular dynamics simulations, enabling the modeling of complex materials and rare events.

tools.name: psiflow
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow library for molecular simulation and ML potential generation
tools.detailed_description: psiflow is a Python library designed for scalable molecular simulations and the automated generation of machine learning potentials. It facilitates the orchestration of quantum chemistry calculations and model training, supporting the development of robust force fields for molecular systems.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for building MLIPs using atomate2
tools.detailed_description: atomate2_ffforge is a DIRECT-driven, active-learning workflow designed to autonomously build machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for diverse material systems such as batteries and catalysts. It is fully integrated with the atomate2 and jobflow ecosystems, enabling high-throughput computational materials science.

tools.name: Uncertainpy
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis toolbox for computational neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: Uncertainpy is a Python toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis, tailored towards computational neuroscience models. It allows researchers to determine how parameters affect model output without requiring extensive changes to the underlying model code.

tools.name: janus-core
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for machine learnt interatomic potentials development and usage
tools.detailed_description: janus-core provides a collection of tools and utilities to support the development, training, and deployment of machine learnt interatomic potentials (MLIPs). It is designed to facilitate atomistic simulations in materials science.

tools.name: UF3
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-Fast Force Fields library for generating interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating ultra-fast interatomic potentials using B-spline basis functions. It focuses on effective two- and three-body potentials that are linear in parameters, enabling rapid evaluation and fitting for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Finetuna
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate active learning workflows for training and fine-tuning machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs). It automates the selection of configurations for DFT calculations to improve potential accuracy efficiently.
